channel.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
channel.description: There was a guy in that cage who said "help finally came" or something then his buddy ate him.... and there's nothing else in the room and I'm not sure where to go. The door where the guy is, is locked. ![2012-09-14_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://qh3bLy6S8vP8utnzAVU4O5Db64b.jpeg) ![2012-09-14_00004.jpg|690x500](upload://lY8DpziYv6lBNeuF0WeoFLuRh9s.jpeg) ![2012-09-14_00003.jpg|690x500](upload://dBDBc38ye9v7fMItawAg2XMjQe8.jpeg)

item.description:
i had total of 4 security men and 2 scientist following me until i had to jump to the elevator shaft where the scientist falls down. =( i miss them.

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Clueless
item.description:
Eltripas:

The alternate route is through some ducts, you get there from some office that got some kind of stairs in the wall, you need to break part of the celling to go.

OK Thanks
found it
once i climbed up the ladder and made my way through the duct the “Permeable Infrastructure” Achievment popped

i felt certain i would find the SPAS-12 Shot Gun via the Alternate Route as the Black Mesa Wiki insists it can be first found in the Office Complex level
https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Office_Complex
but no shotgun found

i guess the shotgun really dosent appear until the next level

Strange Wiki Typo Regards

Read full topic
item.source: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: fsSnowboard
item.description:
Ok, I think I found it. There is an office that had an energy pack outside the large cubicle area. There is a ladder installed on the wall, break some more tiles and climb up. It allows you to disable the turret.

Anyone know how to enter the double doors in this area that make a locked sound, and not the invalid beep sound?

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Gregorovich
item.description:
I prefer luring them into barnacles. But, alas, we all have to abandon out NPC companions frequently. That was one problem I had with the original - NPCs would often be stuck behind for the inability to climb ladders or jump over desks.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: SirBlitz
item.description:
Hey, nevermind guys! After forging ahead for a little while, I found that a door opens allowing you to go back and recollect your guys and continue. Sorry about the needless thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: SirBlitz
item.description:
Okay so first off, I’d just like to say really quick how much I love this game. It’s completely amazing.

Now for the question: I’m at bm_c1a2c and I’ve amassed a crowd of four other people following me. I managed to get everyone to a large cafeteria where there was a very cool zombie fight. However, the cafeteria doors are blocked by tables and what-not and I can find no other way around. Do I have to abandon my faithful companions? I hate leaving NPCs behind unless they say something like, “You go on ahead! We’ll be fine here!” or something of the sort.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Clueless
item.description:
Hi
Just Finished the “Office Complex” chapter
one of the Achievements is to get through the chapter using an “Alternate Route”
anyone know where that route begins?
Also, Supposedly the SPAS -12 Shot Gun is first available in this chapter
anyone know where it can be found?

Searching Aimlessly Regards

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: uncle_revie
item.description:
SteinOnkel:

Hello,

I read on the wiki that it can be first acquired in office complex. Didn’t find it there.

At the beginning of “We’ve got hostiles!” it’s in the security office to the right…taunting me.

I have searched every inch of this level trying to get in with no success. Am I missing something?

No can find in the office complex only in weve got hostiles at the end

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: tomkeb
item.description:
Hello,
could somebody give me a hint how to get to the alternative route in Office Complex? I’ve been going through the level two times but I didn’t find anything. Also, what about mentioning it in the Wiki?

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: GordonFreedman
item.description:
Actually, you get it pretty soon after you meet the screaming scientist. Just work your way through that level and you’ll end up in that grate the scientist got pulled into, and land into his office.

Read full topic
item.source: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Office Complex: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Katana:

That security office in We’ve Got Hostiles is accessible only at the end of the chapter. You basically come back to that area in order to open the silo door (as that scientist was screaming to do)

So I’m guessing the first Shotgun you have access to is dropped by HECU Shotgunners?

Read full topic
